name: @upcoach/monorepo
description: UpCoach Platform - Comprehensive Testing and Quality Assurance

scripts.install:all: npm ci && npm run install:mobile && npm run install:apps && npm run install:services
scripts.install:apps: cd apps/admin-panel && npm ci && cd ../cms-panel && npm ci && cd ../landing-page && npm ci
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:apps && npm run build:mobile
scripts.build:apps: cd apps/admin-panel && npm run build && cd ../cms-panel && npm run build && cd ../landing-page && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:backend && npm run test:unit:frontend && npm run test:unit:mobile
scripts.test:unit:frontend: npm run test:unit:admin && npm run test:unit:cms
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:backend && npm run test:integration:contracts
scripts.test:e2e: cd tests/e2e && npm ci && npx playwright test
scripts.test:visual: cd visual-tests && npm ci && npx playwright test
scripts.test:performance: npm run test:performance:api && npm run test:performance:frontend
scripts.test:security: npm run test:security:scan && npm run test:security:dependencies
scripts.test:security:dependencies: npm audit --audit-level=high && cd services/api && npm audit --audit-level=high
scripts.test:accessibility: cd apps/admin-panel && npm run test:a11y && cd ../cms-panel && npm run test:a11y
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.lint:frontend: cd apps/admin-panel && npm run lint && cd ../cms-panel && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.lint:fix:frontend: cd apps/admin-panel && npm run lint:fix && cd ../cms-panel && npm run lint:fix
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend && npm run format:mobile
scripts.format:frontend: cd apps/admin-panel && npm run format && cd ../cms-panel && npm run format
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run quality:assess
scripts.coverage:report: npm run coverage:combine && npx nyc report --reporter=html --reporter=text
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run start:api" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:cms"
scripts.start:test:parallel: concurrently "npm run start:api" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:cms" "npm run start:landing"
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run quality:check && npm run deploy:staging:only
scripts.deploy:production: npm run quality:check && npm run deploy:production:only
scripts.setup:dev: npm run install:all && npm run build && npm run test:unit
scripts.setup:ci: npm run install:all && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run quality:assess
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:build && npm run clean:test
scripts.clean:test: rm -rf test-results coverage apps/*/coverage services/*/coverage mobile-app/coverage

author: UpCoach Team
